com.mygdx.game

Class StartScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • com.mygdx.game.StartScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class StartScreen
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
    A screen which is displayed before the game starts.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch
      The sprite batch to draw on.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Pixmap black
      The pixmap to use for the fade in black texture.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture blackTex
      The black texture.
      private float fadeInCounter
      The current alpha of the black texture, used for the fading in effect.
      private Game game
      The game this StartScreen belongs to.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.GlyphLayout grey
      The GlyphLayout to use for grey text.
      private float runningTime
      How long the StartScreen has been displayed for.
      private java.lang.String START_MESSAGE
      The message to display to the user on the screen.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.GlyphLayout white
      The GlyphLayout to use for white text.
